name: Song of Memories
effects: Restore 1500 (+9x, Heal) HP split over 3 turns to all allies while singing
Restore 5 (+0.1x, Heal) MP split over 3 turns to all allies while singing

name: Song of Memories
回憶之歌
추억의 노래
Chanson nostalgique
Lied der Erinnerungen
Canción nostálgica
desc_short: Gradually restore HP and MP for all allies while singing
歌唱期間持續恢復全體隊員HP、MP
노래하는 동안 아군 전체의 HP와 MP 서서히 회복
Augmente progressivement les PV et les PM de tous les alliés en chantant
Während das Lied andauert, regenerieren alle Verbündeten LP und MP.
Recupera VIT y PM de todos los aliados poco a poco al cantar
desc_long: Gradually restores HP and MP for all allies while singing.
歌唱期間持續恢復全體隊員HP、MP。
노래하는 동안 아군 전체의 HP와 MP가 서서히 회복합니다.
Augmente progressivement les PV et les PM de tous les alliés en chantant.
Während das Lied andauert, regenerieren alle Verbündeten LP und MP.
Recupera la VIT y los PM de todos los aliados poco a poco al cantar.
